page.title: 10MARKET RASEN-SHOPS ETC.
page.content: For what is a small country town Rasen has a wide variety of shops including butchers, bakers, fruiterers, fashion stores,gents outfitters,saddlers,drapers and furnishers,electrical, etc. There are 3 banks and 6 building societies represented in the town with 3 solicitors. There are 2 supermarkets which can compete with the larger stores of Lincoln & Grimsby Almost every type of shop is present. These are mostly to be found in Queen Street which is the main road through the town. Also there are two printers, one of which prints the local newspaper the Market Rasen Mail. This paper has been printed for about 100 years and has a circulation of 3,500 each weekly issue. It covers a wide area in its articles.
